page.title: 03DUNDEE - WATER SERVICES
page.content: The water for our area comes from the {BACKWATER RESERVOIR.}This reservoir covers 182 hectares and has a capacity of 25 million cubic metres.Using hydraulic engineering,the water services planned the route for the pipe so that the water could reach all the surrounding area.The new pipes are made of polypropelene which is cheap and easy to manipulate.The pipes are laid at a depth of 1 metre to prevent them from freezing.The daily demand for water is 59,000 cubic metres.None of this water is recycled.It goes down the sewer pipes and into the{RIVER {TAY.}This causes major pollution problems on the beaches.There are no plans for water recycling although the water services would prefer this as it would be less costly in the long run.
